sub_title: Designer| ETL Developer | Business Intelligence | Data Warehouse |
summary:
Experience of 8 years in IT industry, including data warehouse, database, ETL, banking and finance, Manufacturing domain. Currently working as Designer, lead ETL developer and business analyst in KPN.

-Rich knowledge of ETL tools, Informatica PowerCenter, Informatica Developer.
-Good understanding of data warehouse concepts.
-Performed requirement, analysis, design, development and implementation of data warehousing projects.
-Good exposure in Teradata.

Skillset:
ETL Tools: Informatica PowerCenter.
Database: IBM DB2, Teradata 15.00.
Modelling: erwin
Programming Language: Unix, Visual Basic
Others: Jenkins

school.name: Narayana College of Education, Pedarupalli, A.K.Nagar, Nellore

profile_positions.description:
Projects: CRIT (Corporate Retail International Tops), Fintax, ADW (ABN AMRO data warehouse), Via-Fino, DIAL (Digital Integration & Access Layer).

Client: ABN AMRO NL

DIAL is a metadata - driven digital integration  and access layer that acts as an abstraction layer between data providers and consumers, where data consumers can see, access and query the data in a consistent manner, at any time and speed.

The goal of a CRIT (Bethmann Bank) project which is a subsidiary of ABN-AMRO based out of Frankfurt, Germany that delivered performance trends and metrics for the entire Revenue Cycle Management process aims at replacing current reporting solution used in Bethmann Bank for sales controlling.
The goal of the Via-Fino and Fintax is to create Data Marts from ABN AMRO data warehouse(ADW), which will be used to fulfill the reporting requirement of Via-Fino.
The goal of the project is to create Data Marts from ABN AMRO data warehouse(ADW), which will be used to fulfill the reporting requirement of various projects like CIF, BCDB etc.

Roles:
-Act as a lead technical design architect, handled a team consist of 8 members.
-Design generic ETL component for data quality validation which can be easily integrated with any existing ETL components.
-Develop ETL components using Power Center for various business requirements.
-Analysis and tuning of Teradata components for better performance.
- Adhoc analysis environment for analytical requirements.
-Experience on creation of mainframe components for Operation purpose.
-Involved in CI/CD testing and deployment activities.
-Share Data and Operational Requirements
-Perform impact analysis on Source and on DIAL.
-Finalize file layout & Source metadata (column level information for data quality checks)
-Establish Source System MQFTE connectivity with DIAL

Skillset:
Informatica 9.6.1
Teradata Client 16.00
Jenkins
Spark
Unix
IBM Tivoli Workload Scheduler 
VBA
BDWM

Highlights:
Automated few tools using VBA code to avoid manual work.
profile_positions.title: IT Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Project: Enterprise Memory(EM)

Client: ABN AMRO NL

Goal of the EM project is to collect data from various heterogeneous source system(format VSAM, Flat files) and store it as an operational data store(ODS). Data quality validations are done before storing the data in ODS as SCD type-2. This data is further used to create ABN AMRO data warehouse.

Roles:
-Design and development of Informatica ETL components to maintain SCD type-2 history in operational data store.
-Design and development of Informatica ETL components for data quality validations.
-Creation and Scheduling of Mainframe jobs using IBM Tivoli workload scheduler.
-Import, export from/to file to/from DB2.
-Creation of data parsing UNIX scripts.
-Development of fastload scripts to load data in Teradata.
-Writing history conversion SQL's using cursors in DB2.
-Sizing of the Target Database based on the growth and volume of the data.

Skillset:
Informatica PowerCenter 9.1.0
DB2 LUW 9.7.9
Teradata 13.10
UNIX
IBM Tivoli Workload Scheduler 

Highlights:
Many Ideas were given for improvements in ABN AMRO.
profile_positions.title: System Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project: Chrysler 

Client: CHRYSLER US

Goal of the project was to creates & maintains a new LPAR (Logical partition) in Mainframes. That new LPAR was used to develop an INTERFACE between SAP & MAINFRAMES. Also our DBA (Data Base Administration) team provided support to the INTERFACE developing & SAP (Systems, Applications and Products) teams after the completion of LPAR development.


Roles:
-Developed REXX tools in mainframe.
-Documented design of the automated programs.
-Developed mainframe OPC ( Operations, Planning and Control) components.
-Worked on Job monitoring & Error resolution.

Skillset:
Cobol
DB2
Rexx
JCL

Highlights:
Automated tools using Rexx in mainframe that helped to automate data transfer to new LPAR.
